articles.title: Brad Butterworth tipped to skipper Alinghi's America's Cup challenge - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Swiss set to officially confirm their challenge and a wise old Kiwi head could have a key role to keep defenders Team NZ on edge.
articles.content:
Brad Butterworth is tipped to make an Americas Cup return as skipper for Alinghis return to action.
 The Société Nautique de Genève, Alinghis backing club in Switzerland, have an international media… [+3089 chars]
